response.result:
Here is the current knowledge base:

--- START OF DOC: 4b4394f2acd741a2bec099266f3565ce.pdf ---
TYPE: Resume (PDF)
SUMMARY: Here's a summary of the resume:

*   **Name:** Himan Manduja

*   **Skills:**
    *   Backend & DevOps (Flask, REST API design, SQLAlchemy, MySQL, Docker, GitHub Actions CI/CD, AWS (EC2, S3, IAM), Testing & Monitoring)
    *   Programming & Scripting (Python, Java, JavaScript, PHP, C++)
    *   Machine Learning (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Data Preprocessing, Model Evaluation)
    *   Web Development (React, Vite, HTML, CSS)
    *   APIs (OpenAI, Hugging Face, Gemini, Anthropic)
    *   Tools (Git/GitHub, VS Code, Postman, Docker)

*   **Work Experience (Projects):**
    *   **NutriChef - Al-Driven Meal Planning Web Application:** Built a full-stack web app to manage recipes, allergens, and meal planning. Integrated AI/ML components, designed RESTful API backend, and implemented unit/integration tests.
    *   **FertiliZen - Fertilizer Recommendation Web App:** Developed React + Flask app predicting fertilizer needs. Trained a stacking ensemble model, packaged trained models for deployment, and documented EDA.
    *   **Butterfly Prediction – Species Classification Web App:** Fine-tuned MobileNetV2 CNN to classify butterfly species, applied augmentations and callbacks, and integrated into Flask REST API + React frontend for real-time image predictions.

*   **Education:**
    *   Bachelor of Science with Honors in Software Engineering, Cardiff Metropolitan University, 2024-2025
    *   Diploma in Computer Science and Software Engineering, Cardiff Metropolitan University, 2024
--- END OF DOC: 4b4394f2acd741a2bec099266f3565ce.pdf ---

parts.text:
OK, I have the following information about you:

Based on your resume, your name is Himan Manduja. You have skills in Backend & DevOps (Flask, REST API design, etc.), Programming & Scripting (Python, Java, etc.), Machine Learning, Web Development (React), and various APIs and tools. You've worked on projects like NutriChef (an AI-driven meal planning web app), FertiliZen (a fertilizer recommendation app), and a butterfly species classification app. You studied at Cardiff Metropolitan University.

Your GitHub profile (HimanM) shows 21 public repositories, 8 followers, and you are following 14 users. Your top repos include "5-Day-AI-Agents-Intensive-Course-with-Google", "Amber_Bakery_System", and "Butterfly-Predict". You've recently been active on "HimanM" and "5-Day-AI-Agents-Intensive-Course-with-Google". You use languages like Java, JavaScript, Jupyter Notebook, and Python.

Is there anything specific you'd like me to help you with using this information, like drafting a cover letter or email? Let me know the role or company you're targeting! If you have a job description, that would be super helpful. Otherwise, I can generate a sample one.
